titlealts.searchtitle: Data Set: Mental Health Minimum Data Set (Version 4-1) (Retired) - Overview

p.b: Mental Health Minimum Data Set (version 4-1) has been retired from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary as at 01 September 2014.

div.p: See the Clinical_Data_Sets_Menu for a link to the Mental Health and Learning Disabilities Data Set which has replaced the Mental Health Minimum Data Set .

p.b: The last live version of this item is available in the July 2014 release of the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.
Access to this version can be obtained by emailing information.standards@nhs.net with "NHS Data Model and Dictionary - Archive Request" in the email subject line.
